section_title: Holocaust (Return of Cultural Objects) Act 2009: repeal of sunset provision
section_text: 1 In section 4 of the Holocaust (Return of Cultural Objects) Act 2009— a in the heading, for  “, commencement and sunset” substitute  “                and commencement              ” , and b omit subsection (7) (which provides for the Act to expire after 10 years).

2 1 This Act extends to— a England and Wales, and b Scotland. 2 This Act comes into force on the day on which it is passed. 3 This Act may be cited as the Holocaust (Return of Cultural Objects) (Amendment) Act 2019.
